author: manjula
msg: Adding the atom feed of my blog entry to planet webservices.

author: dwoods
msg: creating a genesis 1.3.1 release to fix issues.  genesis-1.3 is required for server 2.1.x, as later genesis versions have different tools-maven-plugin validation code, which fails with server 2.1.3-SNAPSHOT

author: damrhei
msg: These changes will allow the 'Reduce WSDL Memory Cache' property to be set on the DescriptionBuilderComposite objects that are supplied to the EndpointDescriptionImpl. This provides an alternative way to communicate that AxisService resources should be released in addition to already configuring this behavior in the axis2.xml.

author: aconway
msg: Move frame processing out of CPG dispatch queue for cluster.
PollableQueue is a pollable in-memory queue, will probably move it to sys.
